Ajay is given the entire responsibility of the estate, while Pratap squanders money on courtesans and alcohol. Sanjukta trusts Ajay, until one day when a villager complains to her that Ajay has got his daughter, Geeta, pregnant; additionally she also finds out that Ajay has been misappropriating money, and also owes money to a prostitute named Leelabai, the very woman who sold Tulsi to Rajnath.

name: Medal (Hindi) 4K
actors: Jayy Randhawa, Jag Singh, Baani Sandhu, Hobby Dhaliwal, Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat, Raj Buttar
description: Rajvir Singh, a young athlete, dreams of winning a gold medal, but tragedies always prevent him from achieving his goal. After losing his hearing due to an accident, he gets admission to an athlete academy where he betrays by angad.

name: The Paperboy
actors: Zac Efron, Matthew McConaughey, Nicole Kidman, John Cusack, David Oyelowo, Macy Gray, Scott Glenn, Nealla Gordon
description: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

name: Billy and Molly An Otter Love Story - 4K
actors: Billy Mail, Susan Mail
description: A man forms an unlikely friendship with a wild otter while living in the remote Shetland Islands.

name: Valayam (Hindi)
actors: Digangana Suryavanshi, Laksh Chadalavada, Kalpalatha, Kireeti Damaraju, Noel Sean, Ravi Prakash, Sri Sudha Bhimireddy, Ravi Varma
description: When his wife goes missing, Arvind must solve the mystery of her disappearance before time runs out and he becomes the prime suspect.

name: About Us
actors: Ross McCall, Allison Miller, Alessandra Mastronardi, Joseph Siprut
description: A young couple revisit the location where they spent their honeymoon eight years earlier, in an effort to rekindle their troubled marriage. We watch as they navigate the beauty and the pain of love, culminating in a heartbreaking finale as truths are revealed.

name: Blackball
actors: Paul Kaye, Johnny Vegas, James Cromwell, Bernard Cribbins, Alice Evans, Vince Vaughn, Imelda Staunton, James Fleet
description: Blackball follows the fortunes of Cliff Starkey, a working-class fine of lawn bowls with an exceptional talent. Wanting to take on the Aussies he manages to become regional champion, only to get banned. Sports agent Rich Schwartz picks him up and makes him so popular the Bowls Committee deem to lift the ban. Now the question is whether he can regain his form and his friends to beat the Aussies.

name: Neither the Sea Nor the Sand
actors: Susan Hampshire, Frank Finlay, Michael Petrovitch, Michael Craze, Jack Lambert, Betty Duncan, David Garth, Anthony Booth
description: Recovering from a failed marriage, Anna Robinson retreats to the haunting, eerie climes of the Isle of Jersey, where she finds fulfillment in an affair with lighthouse keeper Hugh. But when sudden death strikes, Anna finds herself inconsolable and longs for the arms of her lover... who unexpectedly returns from the dead, with a few macabre changes awaiting them both.

name: A Hundred Streets
actors: Gemma Arterton, Idris Elba, Ryan Gage, Samantha Barks, Emma Rigby, Ken Stott, Tom Cullen, Charlie Creed-Miles
description: Four people, four extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.

name: Surfwise
description: The inspiring and tumultuous story of 85-year old surfer, health advocate and sex guru, Dr. Dorian "Doc" Paskowitz, his wife Juliette, and their nine children who were all home-schooled and raised in a small camper on the beach, where they surfed and had to adhere to the strict diet and lifestyle of animals in the wild.

name: The Night Sitter
actors: Elyse Dufour, Jack Champion, Jermaine Rivers, Amber Neukum, J. Benedict Larmore, Ben Barlow, Bailey Campbell, Joe Walz
description: A scheming con artist poses as the innocent babysitter "Amber" to steal from a wealthy occult enthusiast with a reclusive son, Kevin. Her crew arrives to clean out the house just as Kevin stumbles upon a prized artifact and unwittingly summons a trio of witches known as The Three Mothers.

name: Shiddat
actors: Radhika Madan, Sunny Kaushal, Diana Penty, Mohit Raina, Gandharv Dewan, Vidhatri Bandi, Gaurav Amlani
description: Love-struck Jaggi can cross the seven seas for his dream girl, Kartika. Even if it means stopping her wedding as he doesn't want to be friend-zoned.

name: Andrea Bocelli 30 The Celebration
actors: Andrea Bocelli, Ed Sheeran, Katharine McPhee, Brian May, Shania Twain, Jon Batiste, Russell Crowe, Sofía Vergara
description: Journey to the Teatro del Silenzio (Theater of Silence), Lajatico, where once-in-a-lifetime performances showcase the Maestro’s extensive and beloved repertoire, alongside captivating duets with an unprecedented cast of global superstars, including Ed Sheeran, Shania Twain, Will Smith, Jon Batiste, Sofia Carson, Lang Lang, Nadine Sierra and more. With extraordinary staging, production, and visuals, set against a landscape of unparalleled beauty amongst the Tuscan hills, Andrea Bocelli’s sensational career comes to life in a truly unforgettable experience.

name: Bonjour Tristesse
actors: Lily McInerny, Chloë Sevigny, Claes Bang, Nailia Harzoune, Aliocha Schneider, Nathalie Richard, Mélodie Adda, Rosalie Charrier
description: At the height of summer, 18-year-old Cécile is relaxing by the French seaside with her father and falling in love with her new boyfriend. The arrival of her late mother's enigmatic friend turns her world upside down.

name: What The Nanny Saw
actors: Laurie Fortier, Ryan Francis, Lindsay Hartley, Cody Bagshaw, Revell Carpenter, Jack Austin, Christy Tate, Emily Roslyn Villarreal
description: When nanny Kim accidentally discovers that her employer, Steven, is having an affair with his kids’ Spanish tutor, she decides to keep it to herself so as not to risk splitting his family apart. But when Steven’s mistress is murdered and he tells the police that he hasn’t seen her in months, Kim realizes she’s the only person who knows he’s lying and she’s determined to learn why.

name: Head Above Water
actors: Harvey Keitel, Cameron Diaz, Billy Zane, Craig Sheffer, Shay Duffin
description: Judge George brings his young wife, Nathalie, to a remote island for a vacation. But while George accompanies their only neighbor -- Nathalie's childhood friend Lance -- on a fishing trip, Nathalie spends time with her ex, Kent. When Kent ends up dead the next morning, Nathalie tries to hide the evidence before her husband gets home. After the body is found, the events of the previous night unravel, with unexpected revelations.

name: Christmas Trade
actors: William Baldwin, Michael Campion, Denise Richards, Tom Arnold, Parker Brightman, Dirk Brown
description: A career-oriented single father and his 11-year-old son are forced to see their worlds through each other's eyes when some Christmas magic switches their bodies. The pair find themselves growing closer as they scramble to figure out the secret of the magic that caused their predicament in time for Christmas.

actors: Jack O'Connell, Paul Anderson, Sean Harris, Sam Reid, Sam Hazeldine, Charlie Murphy, Valene Kane, David Wilmot
description: A young British soldier must find his way back to safety after his unit accidentally abandons him during a riot in the streets of Belfast.

name: Deadly Invitations
actors: Natalie Brown, Lola Flanery, Marnie Mahannah, Nik Andrews
description: An influencer comes across a VIP party invite not meant for her and dives headfirst into the side of the industry where secrets are worth killing for.

name: Rogue Cell: Shadow Warrior
actors: Bryan G. Thompson
description: A ride-share driver's violent past proves useful when his passenger witnesses a murder and needs a quick escape from a group of highly skilled mercenaries. The driver's life spins out of control as he finds himself thrust into the world of international espionage without any specialized training or warning.

name: Dinner in America - 4K
actors: Kyle Gallner, Emily Skeggs, Pat Healy, Griffin Gluck, Lea Thompson, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Ryan Malgarini, Nick Chinlund
description: An on-the-lam punk rocker and a young woman obsessed with his band go on an unexpected and epic journey together through the decaying suburbs of the American Midwest.

name: Anne Of Green Gables: Fire And Dew
actors: Ella Ballentine, Martin Sheen, Sara Botsford, Julia Lalonde, Drew Haytaoglu, Zoe Fraser, Amariah Faulkner, Stefani Kimber
description: Anne heads to Charlottetown to attend accelerated classes as she continues to work towards her dream of being a school teacher. While there, she is forced to adapt quickly to her new surroundings and classmates as she navigates her way through her first school experience outside of her beloved Green Gables. Anne finds herself facing daunting choices for her future, the stirrings of romance, and tragedy unlike anything she's ever known. Meanwhile, Matthew and Marilla Cuthbert contend with advancing age as they deal with financial challenges and creeping ailments.

name: Birthday Girl
actors: Nicole Kidman, Ben Chaplin, Vincent Cassel, Mathieu Kassovitz, Kate Lynn Evans, Stephen Mangan, Sally Phillips, Alexander Armstrong
description: A shy bank clerk orders a Russian mail order bride, and finds his life turned upside down.

name: The Snows Of Kilimanjaro
actors: Gregory Peck, Susan Hayward, Ava Gardner, Hildegard Knef, Leo G. Carroll, Torin Thatcher, Ava Norring, Helene Stanley
description: Writer Harry Street reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Sex Appeal
actors: Louie Bonanno, Tally Chanel, Jerome Brenner, Marcia Karr, Marie Sawyer, Philip Campanaro, Jeffrey Hurst, Gloria Leonard
description: This is the story of young Tony Cannelloni as he attempts to break away from his overbearing mom and strike out on his own. He sets himself up with a new apartment, look, and lifestyle to improve his "sex appeal". Through a series of encounters with a variety of women he gets ever closer to achieving his goal. However, a never-ending series of calamities always seem to interrupt his progress.

name: Final Score
actors: Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan, Ray Stevenson, Amit Shah, Lara Peake, Alexandra Dinu, Lucy Gaskell, Martyn Ford
description: When a stadium is seized by a group of heavily armed criminals during a major sporting event, an ex-soldier must use all his military skills to save both the daughter of a fallen comrade and the huge crowd unaware of the danger.

name: Henna
actors: Rishi Kapoor, Zeba Bakhtiar, Ashwini Bhave, Saeed Jaffrey, Farida Jalal, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Kiran Kumar, Reema Lagoo
description: Beautiful Henna Khan lives the life of a gypsy near the river, Jhelum, in Pakistan with her widowed dad, Khan Baba; three brothers, Ashraf, Razzak, and Zaman; and Razzak's wife, Najma. One day she comes across a male body that has been washed ashore. Khan Baba, Bibi Gul, and Henna take this male in, nurse him back to health, only to find out that he has lost his memory. The male in his sleep cries out the name of "Chand", and everyone starts calling him by that name.

name: Third Eye Blind: Live At Red Rocks
actors: Stephan Jenkins
description: On the eve of the 25th Anniversary of their iconic self-titled debut album, Third Eye Blind is set to play the historic Red Rocks amphitheater for the first time. An approaching storm threatens to cancel the show, as the band overcomes speech-losing migraines, altitude sickness, and a lighting person walking off, all the while delivering a hit-filled performance to thousands of their adoring fans. Cycling through their catalog of mega hits (Graduate, Jumper, How's It Gonna Be, Semi-Charmed Life), Third Eye Blind overcome these impossible circumstances by relying on each other, and connecting with their devoted audience.

name: The Immigrant
actors: Marion Cotillard, Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Renner, Dagmara Domi?czyk, Yelena Solovey, Jicky Schnee, Maja Wampuszyc, Ilia Volok
description: 1921 New York. An immigrant woman is tricked into a life of burlesque and vaudeville until a dazzling magician tries to save her and reunite her with her sister who is being held in the confines of Ellis Island.

name: Heroes and Demons
actors: Jack Axelrod, Chris Hemsworth, Lainie Kazan, Samm Levine, Zach Mills, Rachel Nichols, Norman Reedus, George Segal
director: Skot Bright, Carlos Cuarón, Hattie Dalton
description: Gripping thriller drama with fantastic all-star cast: Six different stories about crooks, misfits, heroes and their determination to overcome the destiny. Stories about intolerance, hopelessness, betrayal, despair, and the unpredictable.

name: Mr And Mrs 420 Again
actors: Gurpreet Ghuggi, Jagjeet Sandhu, Jassie Gill, Karamjit Anmol, Naresh Kathooria, Sanju Solanki, Deepali Rajput, Gurmeet Saajan
description: Balli, a film director, looks for a surrogate mother. Jass, a struggling actor, auditions as Reshma, an item girl, and is chosen. Meanwhile, Jagga, fleeing from MLA’s goons, disguises himself as Jugni. Balli contacts Reshma for surrogacy, while his wife contacts Jugni for the same.

name: Boy (Hindi)
actors: Lakshya Sinha, Sahiti, Vinay Varma
description: 15 year old 'Mahi teja' is studying his 10th. His simple world revolves around his home, school, his best friend 'Vayu Nandan' and his first crush 'Varna' who is also in 10th but in different school. Mahi realizes that Varna has taken pre-admission in National College. So his mission is now to join the same college. But he is devastated to know that the college is considered a Gateway to the IITs and to get an admission the cut off mark in Mathematics is 95%. Mathematics. It's his worst nightmare. He does well in all the other subjects except Maths as he is scared of Mr. Nagendra kumar, his very strict Maths teacher. How he is able to overcome the maths phobia and achieves his goal is the rest of story.

name: I Hired A Contract Killer
actors: Jean-Pierre Léaud, Margi Clarke, Kenneth Colley, T.R. Bowen, Imogen Claire, Angela Walsh, Cyril Epstein, Nicky Tesco
description: After losing his job and realizing that he is alone in the world, a businessman opts to voluntarily end his life. Lacking courage, he hires a contract killer to do the job. Then, while awaiting his demise, he meets a woman and promptly falls in love.

name: Broke
actors: Wyatt Russell, Auden Thornton, Dennis Quaid, Mary McDonnell, Johnny Berchtold, Tom Skerritt, Austin Amelio, Alet Taylor
description: A bronc rider in denial about his fading rodeo career battles against brain injury and a sudden blizzard while reflecting on how it became so difficult to achieve his dreams.

name: Zindagi Zindabaad
actors: Ninja, Mandy Takhar, Sukhdeep Sukh, Sardar Sohi, Yaad Grewal, Rajiv Thakur, Anita Meet, Amrit Amby
description: It is always been said that "Addiction to Life is more stronger than an Addiction to Drugs". Zindagi Zindabaad takes us to the deep insights of five individual lives who are chained into the misery of addiction and how these very individuals break free from these chains to live a clean and more realistic colorful lives.

name: You Get Me
actors: Halston Sage, Jennifer Esposito, Nash Grier, Bella Thorne, Anna Akana, Taylor John Smith, Rhys Wakefield
description: After arguing with his girlfriend, Ali, Tyler lands in the arms of sexy new girl, Holly. The next morning, he finds that not only does Ali agree to take him back, but Holly is a new student at their school and is dead set on her new man.

name: Dolphin Tale 2
actors: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Nathan Gamble, Cozi Zuehlsdorff, Harry Connick Jr., Kris Kristofferson, Bethany Hamilton, Austin Stowell
description: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.

name: The 11th Commandment
actors: Bernard White, Marilyn Hassett, Dick Sargent, Greg Mullavey, Thomas Ryan, Haunani Minn, Steven Ford, Lauren Woodland
description: A murderous psycho breaks out of a mental hospital and goes after his rich uncle who killed his father and raped his mother.

name: Mary Shelleys Frankenstein
actors: Robert De Niro, Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hulce, Helena Bonham Carter, Aidan Quinn, Ian Holm, Richard Briers, John Cleese
description: Based on Mary Shelley's novel, "Frankenstein" tells the story of Victor Frankenstein, a promising young doctor who, devastated by the death of his mother during childbirth, becomes obsessed with bringing the dead back to life. His experiments lead to the creation of a monster, which Frankenstein has put together with the remains of corpses. It's not long before Frankenstein regrets his actions.

name: Danger In The Spotlight
actors: Jessica Morris, Anna Marie Dobbins, Trey McCurley, Harper Holmes, Alivea Disney-LaFavor, Paige Martin Reynolds
description: When Martha's involved in a drunk driving accident, she becomes caretaker to the ballerina injured in the crash. But what if the accident wasn't an accident at all?

name: The Black Pack: Excellence
actors: Taye Diggs, Ne-Yo, Eric Bellinger
description: Features special guests to commemorate Juneteenth and celebrate Black excellence and culture with musical and dance performances.

name: Rangle River
actors: Victor Jory, Margaret Dare, Robert Coote, George Bryant, Rita Pauncefort, Leo Cracknell
description: Marion Hastings returns to her father Dan's cattle property in western Queensland after being away in Europe for fifteen years. She is treated with hostility by her father's foreman, Dick Drake, and her father's neighbour, Don Lawton.

name: The Soulmate Search
actors: Jonathan Stoddard, Alexandra Harris, Brooke Burfitt, Alexis Baca, James Stewart Welch Jr., Donna Rae Allen, Mary Leonard, Sarah Malfara
description: When Lindsay gets the chance to sign up to the notoriously exclusive dating service Eternity, she clashes with Will, her first date. They mutually agree this dating service has been a complete bust and make a deal to get their money back. However, when they turn up at the door, they find all the furniture gone, Eternity nowhere to be found and make a pact to find out the truth – they’ve been conned! Or have they…?

name: Here We Go
actors: Jim Howick, Katherine Parkinson, Alison Steadman, Tom Basden, Jude Collie, Freya Parks, Tori Allen-Martin, Mica Ricketts
description: Family life with no filter. The Jessops navigate life's everyday challenges - from changing jobs to kidnapping dogs. Chaotic comedy with Alison Steadman and Katherine Parkinson.

name: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
actors: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg, Esai Morales, Pom Klementieff, Henry Czerny, Holt McCallany
description: Ethan Hunt and team continue their search for the terrifying AI known as the Entity — which has infiltrated intelligence networks all over the globe — with the world's governments and a mysterious ghost from Hunt's past on their trail. Joined by new allies and armed with the means to shut the Entity down for good, Hunt is in a race against time to prevent the world as we know it from changing forever.

name: Stellanomicon: Future Fear
description: In a distant future, an archeologist must use ancient technology in hopes of finding a way to fight back an army of alien attackers and escape the planet.

name: Crazy Fun Park
actors: Henry Strand, Stacy Clausen, Hannah Ogawa, Justin Holborow, Pedrea Jackson, Lee Halley
description: A shy teen wants desperately to fit in and enjoy his high school years if only his dead best friend and a posse of rotting ghouls would stop sabotaging him at every turn.

name: Séance Games Metaxu
actors: Olivia Deligan, Madison Taylor, Andrew James Ferguson, Bernard Timmons II, Eric Roberts, Tane McClure, Nisha Catron, Farryl Christina Lawson
description: Social media stars unite to play METAXU, an online séance game, only to find they have unwittingly unleashed the Gates of Hell.

name: Out Of Shadows
actors: Mike Smith
description: An exposé on how Hollywood and the mainstream media manipulate the multitudes by spreading propaganda throughout their content.

name: Outrageous Love With Nene Leakes
actors: NeNe Leakes
description: Nene Leakes is returning to the small screen. The reality show star is taking her talents to Lifetime for Outrageous Love With Nene Leakes.

name: Umakant Pandey Purush Ya.....?
description: “Umakant Pandey Purush Ya…..?”, is a Hindi feature film produced by Reeling Media Services. Initially, they decided to release the Film in Cinemas on 1st January 2019 but because of a lot of films releasing on the same date, they decided to release it on 1st February 2019.  It’s a story of a really innocent guy from Allahabad. In addition, “Umakant Pandey” the title character doesn’t have any friends or colleagues to spend time with. He becomes doubtful about his sexuality somehow! Therefore, He does many things suggested by his so-called well-wishers without thinking about anything and keeps getting stuck in more and more problems. In conclusion, his Dad comes In his support and He manages to sort his problems and things get into place.

name: The Trauma Code: Heroes On Call
actors: Ju Ji-hoon, Choo Young-woo, Ha Young, Yoon Kyung-ho, Jeong Jae-kwang, Kim Eui-sung
description: To create a top-tier trauma center, a war-seasoned doctor arrives — bringing his blunt but skilled ways to transform his team into life-saving mavericks.

name: Benevolence
actors: Tim Godfrey, Kalu Ikeagwu, Fragrance Kayoh, Chioma Nwosu, Ijeoma Peters, Emeka Smith
description: A woman in despair meets a mysterious man under circumstances that she believes may be a case of divine intervention.

name: Greed
actors: Steve Coogan, Asa Butterfield, Isla Fisher, Sophie Cookson, Shirley Henderson, Stephen Fry, David Mitchell, Sarah Solemani
description: A retail billionaire's 60th birthday party is celebrated in an exclusive hotel on the Greek island of Mykonos.

name: Dangerous Khiladi 7 (Hindi) 4K
actors: Silambarasan, Jyothika, Prakash Raj, Vivek, Meghna Naidu, Nagesh, Devadarshini, Radha Ravi
description: Saravana and Krishna are close buddies in college. Saravana sees a video tape of Krishna's sister Sadhana studying in London and falls in love with her. So to meet her, Saravana goes with Krishna to a village near Tirunelveli where he finds that there is a bloody war going on between two warring caste groups. Krishna's brother Soundarapandi his wife and Krishna are killed by the rival group of Dorai Singam. However Saravana saves Sadhana and takes her to Chennai. Initially Sadhana is not accepted by Saravana's large family but slowly when they come to know about her background they support and love her. The rest of the film is how Saravana tries to help Sadhana to go back to London, and in the process eliminates the entire gang of Dorai Singam single-handedly.

name: The Barn
actors: Guillaume Faure, Karen French, Ken Samuels, Piper Lincoln, Auregan, Yannik Mazzilli
description: A serial killer strikes Sugar Grove, Virginia. A rising journalist comes to town to cover the story : her investigation will soon lead her to the town's darkest secret, at her own risks.

name: Mojave
actors: Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund, Mark Wahlberg, Walton Goggins, Louise Bourgoin, Fran Kranz, Dania Ramirez, Matt Jones
description: A suicidal artist goes into the desert, where he finds his doppelgänger, a homicidal drifter.

name: The Last Emperor
actors: John Lone, Joan Chen, Peter O'Toole, Ruocheng Ying, Victor Wong Chi-Keung, Dennis Dun, Ryuichi Sakamoto, Maggie Han
description: A dramatic history of Pu Yi, the last of the Emperors of China, from his lofty birth and brief reign in the Forbidden City, the object of worship by half a billion people; through his abdication, his decline and dissolute lifestyle; his exploitation by the invading Japanese, and finally to his obscure existence as just another peasant worker in the People's Republic.

name: Kutch Express (Hindi)
actors: Manasi Parekh, Ratna Pathak Shah, Viraf Patel, Darsheel Safary, Dharmendra Gohil, Kumkum Das
description: Your life is perfect with your family and husband. But when this perfect life is just an illusion, where else do you seek solace?

name: The Dessert
actors: Isabella Campbell
description: Bruce McCulloch of "The Kids in the Hall" presents the next generation of Canadian sketch comedy with an all-out, boundary pushing expedition to the edge of decency.

name: Best Supporting Actors
description: Tyler Tate, a washed up actor whose life has been ravaged by alcoholism, retreats to a small motel near his Ohio hometown after losing his job and family. Overwhelmed by despair, Tate finds himself in a fog of hopelessness until he starts volunteering at a local theater. Teaching acting to a group of troubled teens, he begins to see a vision of a better future.

name: Dead Wrong
actors: Derek Smith, Katrina Bowden, Chet Hanks, Rob Schneider, Joshua Bitton, Cress Williams, Chelsea Debo, Blake Shields
description: A narcissist concocts a get-rich-quick scheme that ignites a violent chain reaction and overwhelms the lives of those around him.

name: TC 2000
actors: Bolo Yeung, Billy Blanks, Jalal Merhi, Bobbie Phillips, Matthias Hues, Kelly Gallant
description: Somewhere in the future the environmental overkill had come. Many people had died. The rich were able to build the underworld, the poor had to stay on the surface building gangs to survive. Jason Storm, an underworld guard gets knowledge of a conspiracy to kill all people on the surface. He needs to flee to the surface, and wins Sumai, a respected martial arts master, as his ally to stop the dirty plot.

name: Eden Lake
actors: Kelly Reilly, Michael Fassbender, Tara Ellis, Jack O'Connell, Finn Atkins, Jumayn Hunter, Thomas Turgoose, James Burrows
description: Eden Lake is a relentlessly tense and immaculately paced horror-thriller about modern youth gone wild. When a young couple goes to a remote wooded lake for a romantic getaway, their quiet weekend is shattered by an aggressive group of local kids. Rowdiness quickly turns to rage as the teens terrorize the couple in unimaginable ways, and a weekend outing becomes a bloody battle for survival.

name: Nadaaniyan
actors: Ibrahim Ali Khan, Khushi Kapoor, Suniel Shetty, Dia Mirza, Mahima Chaudhry, Agastya Shah, Apoorva Makhija, Aaliyah Qureishi
description: A privileged Delhi socialite hires a middle-class student to pose as her boyfriend to maintain her social status. Their pretense becomes complicated when genuine feelings develop between them.

name: Swag (Hindi) 4K
actors: Sree Vishnu, Ritu Varma, Meera Jasmine, Saranya Pradeep, Daksha Nagarkar, Goparaju Ramana, Vadivukarasi, Sunil Varma
description: The eternal battle of the sexes is played out across several generations of a family who seek to obtain a fortune.

name: Salaam E Ishq
actors: Salman Khan, Priyanka Chopra, John Abraham, Vidya Balan, Anil Kapoor, Juhi Chawla, Akshaye Khanna, Ayesha Takia
description: Six couples who do not know each other are brought together by destiny, fate and love

name: Promised
actors: Paul Mercurio, Antoniette Iesue, Daniel Berini, Mirko Grillini, Tina Arena, Sunday Barca Irving, Santo Tripodi, Luke Christopoulos
description: In 1953, two young Italian children are promised in marriage by their fathers. Twenty one years on - despite changing times, fading traditions and 70's liberation - the pair are expected to marry, or face the consequences.

name: Genesis: Paradise Lost
actors: Andrew J. Fabich, Danny Faulkner, Ray Comfort
description: If there is one part of the Bible that has undergone more scrutiny and abuse than any other, it is the very beginning—GENESIS! So what exactly happened at the "Creation," at the "Beginning?"

name: The Way Of The Househusband
description: Tatsu, a notorious and feared yakuza leader nicknamed "The Immortal Dragon," withdraws from the criminal syndicate and becomes a housekeeper to help his wife, Miku. The series features a variety of comedic settings, typically showing Tatsu's domestic activities and intimidating inequality with his looks, as well as multiple encounters with his former colleagues and rivals in the Japanese Criminal Syndicate.

name: Dead Birds
actors: Henry Thomas, Michael Shannon, Nicki Aycox, Patrick Fugit, Muse Watson, Mark Boone Junior, Isaiah Washington, Donna Biscoe
description: A group of Confederate soldiers hole up on an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank, and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.

name: Three Tall Women
description: By turns acerbic, anguished and sarcastically funny, an old woman known to us only as "A" lays bare her inner life in sometimes shocking detail to two others

name: The Physician
actors: Tom Payne, Ben Kingsley, Stellan Skarsgård, Olivier Martinez, Emma Rigby, Elyas M'Barek, Fahri Yard?m, Makram J. Khoury
description: England, 1021. Rob Cole, a boy born in a miserable mining town, swears to become a physician and vanquish disease and death. His harsh path of many years, a quest for knowledge besieged by countless challenges and sacrifices, leads him to the remote Isfahan, in Persia, where he meets Ibn Sina, the greatest healer of his time.

name: Outside Bet
actors: Bob Hoskins, Jenny Agutter, Phil Davis, Vincent Regan, Calum MacNab, Emily Atack, Rita Tushingham, Dudley Sutton
description: A group of print workers in 1980s London club together to buy a race horse.

name: Dinosaur World
actors: Xing Yu, Steven He, Mike Pu, Phuong Kubacki, Roman Alcantara, Evan Assante, Samuel Wang, Tracy Ju
description: The best players from around the world are gathered to be Russell's lab rats on his new game, anything could happen. Everyone has their eyes on the prize, which will give them a second chance at life. Greed will take over friendship, allies will become enemies and the unexpected will come with every move you make in this made-up world infested with dinosaurs. Only one can come up triumphant.

name: The Man Of God
actors: Akah Nnani, Osas Ighodaro, Atlanta Bridget Johnson, Dorcas Shola Fapson, Jude Chukwuma, Binta Ayo Mogaji, Olumide Oworu, Patrick Doyle
description: Samuel forsakes his harsh religious upbringing to live his own life — but his soul remains caught between the world and the faith he left behind.

name: Champs
actors: Mike Tyson, Evander Holyfield, Bernard Hopkins, 50 Cent, Spike Lee, Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg
description: A documentary about the sport of boxing, as seen through the eyes of champions Mike Tyson, Evander Holyfield and Bernard Hopkins.

name: The Y
actors: Leonilla D'Souza, Yuvan hariharan, Kamal Ghimiray, Abhinava Kiran
description: A young woman, Deeksha, loses her voice and memory after a road accident that claims her parents’ lives. As she moves into a mansion inherited from her grandmother, she has ghostly encounters that the doctor blames on PTSD. Is it really her psyche playing tricks, or is the house haunted?

name: A Life At Stake
actors: Angela Lansbury, Keith Andes, Douglass Dumbrille, Claudia Barrett, Jane Darwell, Gavin Gordon, Charles Maxwell, William Henry
description: An out-of-work architect meets a married woman who has a business proposition for him. The architect begins to suspect the woman's interest in him is not just financial and may actually be deadly.

name: N.O.L.A Circus
actors: Dave Davis, Vas Blackwood, Taryn Terrell, Robert Catrini, Ricky Wayne, Jessica Morali, Jessica Morali, Candice Michele Barley
description: In this over the top comedy a rivalry between two competing barbershops in New Orleans escalates dramatically, sending the lives of the owners, their families, and their friends spiraling out of control.

name: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
actors: Rob Brydon
description: Rob Brydon goes on a toe-tapping adventure across the American south to celebrate 100 years of country music. He meets the stars, discovers the genre's roots and dives into the culture.

name: Hannie Caulder
actors: Raquel Welch, Robert Culp, Ernest Borgnine, Jack Elam, Strother Martin, Christopher Lee, Diana Dors, Stephen Boyd
description: Hannie enlists the aid of bounty hunter Tom Price to teach her how to be a gunfighter so she can hunt down the 3 men who killed her husband and raped her.

name: Dushman
actors: Mithun Chakraborty, Mandakini, Deepa Sahi, Alok Nath, Rajesh Khanna, Tanuja Samarth, Ranjeet Bedi, Bob Christo
description: Rakesh (Mithun Chakraborty), a small town boy, has been torn away from his family due to several crisis. His family consisted of his father(Aloknath), mother(Tanuja) and sister(Dipa Sahi). Terror strikes in the family after Aloknath has been sent to jail in fraudulent cases. He himself is on the run due to police threats. In due course of his time, Rakesh meets Lakshmi(Mandakini) and love blossoms. Even though Rakesh tries being truthful, He enters a different world. Will Rakesh unite with his long lost family and lead a happy life with the love of his life?

name: Shehzada
actors: Kartik Aaryan, Kriti Sanon, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Ronit Roy, Sachin Khedekar, Sunny Hinduja, Rajpal Yadav
description: Bantu is hated and neglected by his father Valmiki ever since he was a toddler. Samara, his boss is the first person to show him affection and love until he discovers that the Jindals are his biological parents and not Valmiki. Bantu then decides to seek the Jindals' love and protect them from the threats they face.

name: Woman Thou Art Loosed
actors: Kimberly Elise, Loretta Devine, Debbi Morgan, Michael Boatman, Clifton Powell, Louisa Abernathy, Sean Blakemore, T.D. Jakes
description: An adaptation of Bishop T.D. Jakes' self-help novel, chronciling a woman's struggle to come to terms with her legacy of abuse, addiction and poverty.

name: Re Enter The New York Ninja
actors: Kurtis Spieler, Don Wilson, Cynthia Rothrock, Michael Berryman
description: A profile on martial artist John Liu and the making of his "lost" U.S. directorial debut, New York Ninja.

name: Human Flow
actors: Boris Cheshirkov, Marin Din Kajdomcaj, Princess Dana Firas of Jordan, Abeer Khalid
description: More than 65 million people around the world have been forced from their homes to escape famine, climate change and war, the greatest displacement since World War II. Filmmaker Ai Weiwei examines the staggering scale of the refugee crisis and its profoundly personal human impact. Over the course of one year in 23 countries, Weiwei follows a chain of urgent human stories that stretch across the globe, including Afghanistan, France, Greece, Germany and Iraq.

name: No Exit - 4K
actors: Havana Rose Liu, Danny Ramirez, Dennis Haysbert, David Rysdahl, Dale Dickey, Mila Harris, Benedict Wall, James Gaylyn
description: Stranded at a rest stop in the mountains during a blizzard, a recovering addict discovers a kidnapped child hidden in a car belonging to one of the people inside the building which sets her on a terrifying struggle to identify who among them is the kidnapper.

name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
actors: Angela Bassett, Taye Diggs, Whoopi Goldberg, Regina King, Suzzanne Douglas, Michael J. Pagan, Sicily Johnson, Richard Lawson
description: Through good times and bad, Stella and Delilah have always had each other. Now, Stella's so busy building a life that she's forgotten how to really live. But Delilah is about to change all that. What starts as a quick trip to Jamaica, end as an exhilarating voyage of self discovery as Stella learns to open her heart and find love - even if it's with a man 20 years her junior.

name: Chhichhore
actors: Sushant Singh Rajput, Shraddha Kapoor, Prateik Babbar, Siddharth, Varun Sharma, Tahir Raj Bhasin, Naveen Polishetty, Saharsh Kumar Shukla
description: Raghav, son of high achieving parents succumbs to the pressure that comes with cut-throat entrance exams. As he battles for life in a hospital, his parents regroup with their friends after decades. Together, this older generation, goes on a nostalgia trip reminiscing their college days, hoping their bittersweet memories will help save a teenager, who has lost all will to live.

name: Janaki Jaane (Hindi)
actors: Saiju Kurup, Navya Nair, Sharafudheen, Johny Antony, Kottayam Nazeer, James Elia, Jordi Poonjar, George Kora

name: Gods Army
actors: Matthew A. Brown, Richard Dutcher, Jacque Gray, Jeffrey Scott Kelly, Desean Terry, Michael Buster, John Pentecost, Lynne Carr
description: Life as a Mormon missionary isn't what 19-year-old Brandon Allen expected: so many rules and so few successes. Los Angeles is as unrepentant as Sodom and Gomorrah. He's forced to share a small apartment with five young prank-loving missionaries and, to top it off, his first companion, 29-year-old Marcus Dalton, proves to be a harsh mentor. After only one day as a missionary, Allen is ready to hang up his necktie and go home. Allen becomes a part of the drama occurring under the everyday surface of missionary life. After only a few intense days, Allen finds faith he didn't know he had, and courage he didn't know he lacked. He learns that the time has come to put away childish things, and to become more than just a man--to become a man of God.

name: Ghajini (Hindi)
actors: Suriya, Asin Thottumkal, Nayanthara, Pradeep Ram Singh Rawat, Riyaz Khan, Manobala, Sathyan Sivakumar, Venba
description: After being hit by an iron rod, Sanjay Ramaswamy, a business tycoon, suffers from anterograde amnesia. He is unable to remember anything beyond fifteen minutes. Under such circumstances, he sets out on a quest to find the people who were responsible for his lover Kalpana's murder.

name: The Possession of Hannah Grace
actors: Shay Mitchell, Grey Damon, Stana Katic, Louis Herthum, J.P. Valenti, James A. Watson, Jr, Larry Eudene, Lexie Roth
description: When a cop who is just out of rehab takes the graveyard shift in a city hospital morgue, she faces a series of bizarre, violent events caused by an evil entity in one of the corpses.

name: National Theatre Live: Nye
actors: Michael Sheen, Sharon Small, Remy Beasley, Jon Furlong, Roger Evans, Oliver Llewellyn Jenkins, Rhodri Meilir, Tony Jayawardena
description: Confronted with death, National Health Service founder Aneurin ‘Nye’ Bevan’s deepest memories lead him on a mind-bending journey back through his life; from childhood to mining underground, Parliament and fights with Winston Churchill.

name: The Undertaker
actors: Paul McGann, Tara Fitzgerald, Murray Melvin, Nicholas Rowe, Sean Gilder, Lily Frazer, Roger Barclay, Robert Whitelock
description: A meek undertaker becomes trapped in a violent world when a gangster enlists him to dispose of a growing number of corpses.

name: State Of The Art
description: An exhilarating journey of artistic discovery... 100,000 miles, 1,000 destinations in the search for 100 under-recognized American artists for one unforgettable exhibition. The curatorial team of Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art in Bentonville, Arkansas, crisscrossed the nation to find extraordinary contemporary art happening in unexpected places: the woods of North Carolina, the deserts of Nevada, the backstreets of Pittsburgh, the foothills of Arkansas, the riverbanks of New Orleans. The art and artists found by the Crystal Bridges team led to a groundbreaking exhibition of 227 works of contemporary art, many of which might otherwise have never been seen.

name: Chasing Ice
actors: James Balog, Svavar Jonatansson, Adam LeWinter, Louie Psihoyos, Kitty Boone, Sylvia Earle, Dennis Dimick, Jason Box
description: When National Geographic photographer James Balog asked, “How can one take a picture of climate change?” his attention was immediately drawn to ice. Soon he was asked to do a cover story on glaciers that became the most popular and well-read piece in the magazine during the last five years. But for Balog, that story marked the beginning of a much larger and longer-term project that would reach epic proportions.

name: Blueback - 4K
actors: Mia Wasikowska, Eric Bana, Ariel Donoghue, Ilsa Fogg, Radha Mitchell, Pedrea Jackson, Clarence John Ryan, Albert Mwangi
description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tim Winton, Blueback is a timely tale about the ocean, a beautiful marine creature, and a young girl’s power to change the world.

name: Derelict Rescue
description: They are Britain’s most ambitious home builders, determined to build a new life for their families while taking on the country’s most rundown abandoned buildings.

name: Meena Bazar
description: Meena and Mona are two friends working in prostitution business for them every day is night and every night is day fed with everything they want to give up the profession of flesh trade and start a new life but the society around looks at them in a different way how will the two friends make a better living.

name: Starship Troopers
actors: Casper Van Dien, Dina Meyer, Denise Richards, Jake Busey, Neil Patrick Harris, Clancy Brown, Michael Ironside, Patrick Muldoon
description: Set in the future, the story follows a young soldier named Johnny Rico and his exploits in the Mobile Infantry. Rico's military career progresses from recruit to non-commissioned officer and finally to officer against the backdrop of an interstellar war between mankind and an arachnoid species known as "the Bugs".

name: Laila Majnu - 4K
actors: Avinash Tiwary, Triptii Dimri, Mir Sarwar, Benjamin Gilani, Parmeet Sethi, Sumit Kaul, Farhana Bhat, Sahiba Bali
description: Laila is a free-spirited girl from a conservative family who firmly believes in living for the present. Qais, a spoilt brat, falls head over heels in love with her. Their families, however, are warring over property, which leads to self-destruction, pain and bleeding hearts.

name: Longlegs - 4K
actors: Maika Monroe, Nicolas Cage, Blair Underwood, Alicia Witt, Michelle Choi-Lee, Dakota Daulby, Lauren Acala, Kiernan Shipka
description: FBI Agent Lee Harker is assigned to an unsolved serial killer case that takes an unexpected turn, revealing evidence of the occult. Harker discovers a personal connection to the killer and must stop him before he strikes again.

name: Blast Beat
actors: Moisés Arias, Mateo Arias, Daniel Dae Kim, Kali Uchis, Diane Guerrero, Wilmer Valderrama
description: After their family emigrates from Colombia during the summer of ‘99, a metalhead science prodigy and his deviant younger brother do their best to adapt to new lives in America.

name: Ray Jrs: Rent Due
actors: Ray Jr., Jasmin Brown, Michael Colyar, Landon Romano, Mike Berry, William Cobbins, Machine Gun Kelly, Bj Monet
description: Two down on their luck cousins are forced to come up with a plan to make some cold hard cash when they lose the rent money after a night of partying with two strippers.

name: House of Cards
actors: George Peppard, Inger Stevens, Orson Welles, Perrette Pradier, Keith Michell, Geneviève Cluny, Maxine Audley, Ralph Michael
description: In 1960s Paris, an American boxer stumbles upon an international fascist conspiracy that aims to create a new world order.

name: Dirty Tricks
description: At the elite level, bridge - the world's most popular card game - has become a million-dollar cut-throat business. When the best competitive player is accused of cheating, the ensuing scandal confounds experts, criminal science, celebrities and basic belief in this hilarious true-crime thriller.

name: Mary White
actors: Ed Flanders, Fionnula Flanagan, Kathleen Beller, Tim Matheson, Donald Moffat, Diana Dill, Kaki Hunter
description: In Emporia, Kansas, in the late 1910s and early 1920s, Mary Katherine White, a teenage girl, comes of age. Having grown up in wealth and privilege, as a result she meets famous people of the day. In 1921, at age 16, she dies in a riding accident. Her story is recounted in flashback style by her father, a famous editor, author and publisher.

name: Priceless
actors: Bianca A. Santos, Joel Smallbone, Sarah Minnich, Jim Parrack, David Koechner, Lora Martinez-Cunningham
description: James, down on his luck and desperate for some quick cash, agrees to drive a small truck across country. He soon realizes that he's made a huge mistake and has inadvertently become involved in a dangerous human trafficking ring. The unlikely hero risks it all to shut down the trafficking ring and save the woman he is falling in love with.

name: Sexify
description: To build an innovative sex app and win a tech competition, a sexually inexperienced student and her friends must explore the daunting world of intimacy.

name: Black Butterfly
actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Piper Perabo, Antonio Banderas, Abel Ferrara, Nicholas Aaron, Vincent Riotta, Alexandra Klim, Nathalie Rapti Gomez
description: Remake of French thriller, Papillon Noir by Herve Korian. Paul is a down-on-his-luck screenwriter who picks up a drifter and offers him a place to stay. However, when the deranged stranger takes Paul hostage and forces him to write, their unhinged relationship brings buried secrets to light.

name: Parking (Hindi)
actors: Harish Kalyan, Indhuja Ravichandran, M. S. Bhaskar, Prathana Nathan, Ilavarasu, Rama
description: Two men become involved in an argument over a parking space outside their apartment building.

name: How to Plan an Orgy in a Small Town
actors: Jewel Staite, Ennis Esmer, Tommie-Amber Pirie, Jonas Chernick, Katharine Isabelle, Mark O'Brien, Lauren Lee Smith, Kristian Bruun
description: In high school Cassie Cranston was slut-shamed out of the wholesome and repressed town of Beaver’s Ridge following a humiliating attempt at losing her virginity. Now, years later, a big city sex columnist, Cassie returns home to bury her mother and finds a chance for revenge when her prudish childhood nemesis insists she helps her old friends plan an orgy.

name: Mukti Bhawan
actors: Adil Hussain, Lalit Behl, Geetanjali Kulkarni, Palomi Ghosh, Navnindra Behl, Anil K Rastogi, Tajdar Junaid
description: An ominous dream convinces 77-year-old Dayanand Kumar that his end could be near. He takes the news to his son Rajiv, knowing he wants to breathe his last in the holy city of Varanasi and end the cycle of rebirth, by attaining salvation. Being the dutiful son he is, Rajiv is left with no choice but to drop everything and make the journey with his stubborn father. Daya and Rajiv check into Mukti Bhawan (Hotel Salvation) in Varanasi, a guesthouse devoted to people who want to die there. But as the days go by, Rajiv struggles to juggle his responsibilities back home, while Daya starts to bloom in the hotel. Rajiv gives his father a shot at salvation but as family bonds are tested, he finds himself torn, and not knowing what he must do to keep his life together.

name: Ghoomer
actors: Saiyami Kher, Abhishek Bachchan, Shabana Azmi, Ivanka Das, Angad Bedi, Shivendra Singh Dungarpur, Akshayy Joshi, Piyush Raina
description: Anina, a young woman batting prodigy, loses her right hand in an unfortunate accident on the eve of her international cricketing debut. An unsympathetic, failed and frustrated cricketer enters her life, gives her a new dream and transforms her fate by the most innovative training, to make her play for the Indian cricket team again, as a bowler.

name: Taaqat Vallamai (Hindi)
actors: Premji Amaran, Deepa Shankar
description: Vallamai is a Tamil movie starring Premgi Amaren, Divya Darshini and Deepa Shankar in prominent roles. It is written and directed by Karuppaiyaa Murugan.

name: The Railway Children Return
actors: Jenny Agutter, Sheridan Smith, Tom Courtenay, Beau Gadsdon, KJ Aikens, Austin Haynes, Eden Hamilton, Zac Cudby
description: Follow a group of children who are evacuated to a Yorkshire village during the Second World War, where they encounter a young soldier who, like them, is far away from home.

name: Horatio Hornblower: The Wrong War
actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Robert Lindsay, Antony Sher, John Shrapnel, Samuel West, Peter Vaughan, Jean Badin, Jamie Bamber
description: Lieutenant Hornblower and his shipmates are sent to accompany a doomed royalist invasion of revolutionary France.

name: Kindred
actors: Gillian Moody, Adrian Russell Wills
description: A journey into the emotional landscape of family, love and loss of two close friends, both Aboriginal, who were adopted by white families and have connected back with their bloodline families.

name: Dark Side of the Ring
description: Finding truth at the intersection of fantasy and reality in the veiled world of professional wrestling.

name: Craig Charles: UFO Conspiracies
actors: Craig Charles, Sarah Cruddas, Nick Pope
description: Craig Charles, the BBC 6 Music Radio DJ, star of Red Dwarf and Coronation Street, hosts the show alongside world renowned space journalist astrophysicist, and award-winning author Sarah Cruddas. Craig Charles: UFO Conspiracies follows sci-fi favourite and long-time UFO enthusiast Craig and astrophysicist Sarah as they scrutinise compelling evidence relating to some of the most perplexing UFO encounters of recent years, revealing never before heard testimony to separate fact from fiction and ask: are the unexplained aerial phenomena prowling our skies extra-terrestrial?

name: Killer Book Club - 4K
actors: Veki Velilla, Iván Pellicer, Álvaro Mel, Ane Rot, Carlos Alcaide, María Cerezuela, Hamza Zaidi, Priscilla Delgado
description: Eight horror-loving friends fight for their lives when a killer clown who seems to know the grim secret they share begins to pick them off, one by one.

name: Silly Fellows (Hindi) 4K
actors: Allari Naresh, Sunil Varma, Brahmanandam, Chitra Shukla, Nandini Rai, Jayaprakash Reddy
description: An influential politician on his deathbed reveals the whereabouts of an illegal money stash to his trusted aide, a local MLA who becomes amnesiac after meeting with an accident.

name: Ajab Gazabb Love
actors: Jacky Bhagnani, Nidhi Subbaiah, Darshan Jariwala, Kirron Kher, Arshad Warsi, Arjun Rampal
description: Ajab Gazabb Love ('Strange and Amazing Love') is a 2012 Bollywood romantic comedy film directed by Sanjay Gadhvi and produced by Vashu Bhagnani. The film stars Jackky Bhagnani opposite Nidhi Subbaiah in lead roles, along with Arjun Rampal, Darshan Jariwala and Kirron Kher in supporting roles, whilst Arshad Warsi appears in a cameo role.

name: Re Kill
actors: Roger Cross, Bruce Payne, Scott Adkins, Daniella Alonso, Jesse Garcia, Dimiter Doichinov, Yo Santhaveesuk, Layke Anderson
description: Five years after a zombie outbreak, the men and women of R-Division hunt down and destroy the undead. When they see signs of a second outbreak, they fear humanity may not survive.

name: Tum Milo Toh Sahi
actors: Kishore Nandlaskar, Nana Patekar, Dimple Kapadia, Sunil Shetty, Vidya Malvade, Rehan Khan, Anjana Sukhani, Mohnish Behl
description: Tum Milo Toh Sahi is not just a romantic comedy... it is three unique romantic stories in one.

name: Prime
actors: Richard Gau, Nomsa Twala, Jasmine Hazi, Michael  Lawrence Potter, Sharon Spiegel Wagner, Llewellyn Cordier, Gérard Rudolf, Jack Farham
description: A proud man's traumas and prejudice push away his loving partner, opening him to the seduction of an ancient evil.

name: Runner
actors: Robert Hardin, Lauren Waites, Edward Hendershott
description: Emptied out in Los Angeles, a heartsick gambler from Kentucky decides to confront demons past after a run-in with a mercurial Hollywood drug dealer.

name: The Count of Monte Cristo - 4K
actors: Pierre Niney, Bastien Bouillon, Anaïs Demoustier, Anamaria Vartolomei, Laurent Lafitte, Pierfrancesco Favino, Patrick Mille, Vassili Schneider
director: Alexandre de La Patellière, Matthieu Delaporte
description: Edmond Dantes becomes the target of a sinister plot and is arrested on his wedding day for a crime he did not commit. After 14 years in the island prison of Château d’If, he manages a daring escape. Now rich beyond his dreams, he assumes the identity of the Count of Monte-Cristo and exacts his revenge on the three men who betrayed him.

name: Micky Flanagan If Ever We Needed It
actors: Micky Flanagan
description: Live at the Utilita Arena in Birmingham, Cockney comic Micky Flanagan is back for an hour of old-school jokes about energy bills, retro telly and marital disputes.

name: The Crazies
actors: Timothy Olyphant, Radha Mitchell, Joe Anderson, Danielle Panabaker, Joe Reegan, Glenn Morshower, Gregory Sporleder, Lynn Lowry
description: Four friends find themselves trapped in their small hometown after they discover their friends and neighbors going quickly and horrifically insane.

name: Death Race 2
actors: Luke Goss, Sean Bean, Danny Trejo, Ving Rhames, Tanit Phoenix, Robin Shou, Fred Koehler, Joe Vaz
description: In the world's most dangerous prison, a new game is born: Death Race. The rules of this adrenaline-fueled blood sport are simple, drive or die. When repentant convict Carl Lucas discovers there's a price on his head, his only hope is to survive a twisted race against an army of hardened criminals and tricked-out cars.

name: Broken Lance
description: The remnants of Knight House Corvec fight for survival against the forces of Chaos while dealing with power struggles that pit their High Queen against her niece – the rightful heir.

name: Sinbad: Where U Been?
actors: Sinbad, Gemi Taylor, Alex Al, Judith Hill, Trevor Lawrence Jr., Dawnn Lewis, Greg Phillinganes, Lamont Van Hook
description: Sinbad returns to the stage in this brand-new one-hour comedy special and answers the question his legions of fans have been asking him, “Where Ya Bin?”

name: King Of Clones
actors: Hwang Woo-suk, Han Hak-su, Jin Joong-gwon, Kim Dae-jung, Kim Jong-il, Roh Moo-hyun, Park Ji-sung, Choi Seung-ho
description: From groundbreaking human cloning research to a scandalous downfall, this documentary tells the captivating story of Korea's most notorious scientist.

name: Dealing With Dad
actors: Ally Maki, Hayden Szeto, Peter S. Kim, Dana Lee, Karan Soni, Page Leong, Echo Kellum, Megan Gailey
description: Margaret reluctantly goes back to her hometown with her brothers to deal with the sudden depression of their dad.

name: Beyond Goodbye
actors: Kasumi Arimura, Kentaro Sakaguchi, Toma Ikuta, Yuri Nakamura, Tomokazu Miura, Eita Okuno, Ayumi Ito, Issey Ogata
description: After losing her fiancé in an accident, Saeko feels an inexplicable connection to a stranger — who, by a twist of fate, received his heart and memories.

name: Author: The JT LeRoy Story
actors: Laura Albert, Bruce Benderson, Panio Gianopoulos, Winona Ryder, Ira Silverberg, Savannah Knoop, Courtney Love, Dennis Cooper
description: New York magazine’s October 2005 issue sent shockwaves through the literary world when it unmasked “it boy” wunderkind JT LeRoy, whose tough prose about his sordid childhood had captivated icons and luminaries internationally. It turned out LeRoy didn’t actually exist. He was dreamed up by 40-year-old San Francisco punk rocker and phone sex operator, Laura Albert.

name: Young Masterchef
description: A new generation of foodies are rewriting the rules. Judges Poppy O’Toole and Kerth Gumbs watch over the kitchen battleground to decide which fresh talent has what it takes.
Ved, an ATS Officer is appointed on a secret mission. There he develops a connection with Insiya and falls for her.
name: 26 January
actors: Mrunal Jain, Madhurima Tuli

name: Aravinda Sametha Veera Raghava (Hindi)
actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Pooja Hegde, Jagapati Babu, Eesha Rebba, Supriya Pathak, Sunil Varma, Srinivasa Reddy, Rao Ramesh
description: After participating in a brawl that left his father dead and his rival nearly dead, a young man decides to stay away from violence and leaves his village with hopes of ending the ages-old feud.

name: Born Racer
actors: Dario Franchitti, Scott Dixon, Chip Ganassi, Tony Kanaan
description: A powerful and inspirational story of dedication, danger, fear, and the rare ‘will’ some of us have to defy all personal limitations.  Experience the fastest motorsport on earth through the eyes of five-time champion Scott Dixon and the Chip Ganassi Racing team. Filmed with an access all areas lens, ‘Born Racer’ follows the people who are passionate about the world of auto racing and asks why some individuals feel compelled to face danger and risk their lives in order to win.  Both action-packed and highly-intimate, it features an intense blend of up close and personal filming with never-before-seen spectacular, cutting-edge racing footage to explore a sport that defines the very people who inhabit it, and pushes them to the edge in their desire for success.

name: Lost on a Mountain in Maine
actors: Luke David Blumm, Paul Sparks, Caitlin FitzGerald, Ethan Slater, Griffin Wallace Henkel, Dean Neistat, Bates Wilder, Mason Cufari
description: When twelve-year-old Donn Fendler gets tired of waiting for his father and brothers to join him on the summit of Maine's highest peak, he decides to find his own way back to camp. But Donn doesn't count on a fast-moving fog that obscures the path. He doesn't count on falling down an embankment that hides him from sight. And he doesn't count on taking a turn that leaves him alone to wander aimlessly for nearly two weeks in the empty mountain wilderness.

name: ARQ
actors: Robbie Amell, Rachael Taylor, Gray Powell, Jacob Neayem, Shaun Benson, Adam Butcher, Jamie Spilchuk
description: Husband and wife living in a dystopic future become trapped in a mysterious time loop — one that may have something to do with an ongoing battle between an omnipotent corporation and a ragtag band of rebels.

name: Tevar
actors: Arjun Kapoor, Sonakshi Sinha, Shruti Haasan, Manoj Bajpai, Subrat Dutta
description: A Kabaddi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

name: Go Down Death
actors: Doug Barron, Rayvin Disla, Lucy Kaminsky, Sammy Mena, Bryant Pappas, Simone Xi, Anthony Droz, Burton Crane
description: A cross-episodic melange of macabre folktales supposedly penned by folklorist Jonathan Mallory Sinus.

name: The Big Steam Adventure
description: John Sergeant, Peter Davison and Paul Middleton travel from London to Scotland using only the power of steam. From barges and paddle boats to steam trains and traction engines, the trio use a wide range of steam machines to make their way up the country, and learn about the history and engineering genius of the machines they are travelling on along the way.

name: Starve Acre
actors: Matt Smith, Morfydd Clark, Erin Richards, Sean Gilder, Robert Emms, Roger Barclay, Matilda Firth, Rocco Haynes
description: When their son starts acting strangely, a couple unwittingly allow dark and sinister forces into their home, awakening a long-dormant ancient evil rooted deep in the countryside.

name: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
actors: Kevin Costner, Sienna Miller, Sam Worthington, Giovanni Ribisi, Jena Malone, Abbey Lee, Michael Rooker, Danny Huston
description: Explore the lure of the Old West and how it was won—and lost—through the blood, sweat and tears of many. Spanning 15 years before, during, and following the Civil War, from 1859 to 1874, embark on an emotional journey across a country at war with itself, experienced through the lens of families, friends and foes all attempting to discover what it truly means to be the United States of America.

name: Bodyguards: Secret Lives from the Watchtower
description: Explore the secret world of the bodyguards who risk their lives to protect the rich, famous and powerful.

name: The Furnace - 2020
actors: David Wenham, Ahmed Malek
description: To escape the outback, a young Afghan cameleer falls in with a mysterious bushman on the run with stolen Crown gold.

name: O2 (Hindi)
actors: Nayanthara, Rithvik, Lenaa, Aadukalam Murugadoss, R. N. R. Manohar, Jaffer Idukki, Barath Neelakantan, Rishikanth
description: A mother fights to protect her son and his oxygen cylinder as they get stuck in a tunnel with other passengers and the oxygen level depleting

name: The Corruption Of Divine Providence
actors: Alissa Skovbye, Elyse Levesque, Tantoo Cardinal, Corey Sevier, Paul Amos, Sera-Lys McArthur, Eugene Brave Rock, David La Haye
description: When a teenage girl becomes a battleground for good and evil, only pure faith can broker peace.

name: The Nevers
actors: James Norton, Laura Donnelly, Ann Skelly
description: An epic tale following a gang of Victorian women who find themselves with unusual abilities, relentless enemies, and a mission that might change the world.

name: Banphool
actors: Jeetendra, Babita Kapoor, Shatrughan Sinha, Asrani, Ramesh Dao, Durga Khote, Kanhaiyalal, Sunder
description: Haria lives with his widowed and elderly grandmother at a tea estate and works as Elephant Driver. He has no knowledge of his biological father, as his mother died at the time of his birth. He meets and falls in love with a gypsy girl, Gulabi, and both want to get married. But Gulabi has another suitor, none other than Ajay, the only son of the tea estate owner. When Ajay finds out that Gulabi loves Haria, he plans to get rid of Haria, but fails. He waits for the right moment, and has his men abduct Gulabi. But before he could have his way with her, she is rescued by Raja, but Ajay subsequently shoots Raja to death. An enraged Haria wants to kill Ajay in return, but Ajay's dad stops him from doing so. Then Ajay's dad finds out a secret about his past life, and decides to change his last will and testament. Ajay finds out about this and lays in wait with a shotgun to kill his very own father - and anyone else who dares to stand in his way

name: Kazhuvethi Moorkkan (Hindi)
actors: Arulnithi, Dushara Vijayan, Santhosh Prathap, Saya Devi, Munishkanth, Sharath Lohitashwa, Raja Simman, Yaar Kannan
description: Moorkkasaamy and Bhoominathan are divided by caste yet bound together by a friendship originated during their school days. Havoc reigns when Moorkkan’s father is attacked and all clues direct to Bhoomi being the perpetrator and the circumstances put the lives of two friends in a turmoil.

name: Maan Abhiman
description: Film starring Raj Kiran, Kavita Kiran and Yunus Parvez

name: Public Figure
description: A documentary that investigates the psychological effects of everyday social media use while exploring how our influencers deal with the fame, money, hate and obsession that comes with it.

name: Supercroc
actors: Cynthia Rose Hall, Matthew Blashaw, Kim Little, David Novak, Kristen Quintrall, Marat Glazer, Noel Thurman, Steven Glinn
description: A team of soldiers must stop a giant, bloodthirsty crocodile from reaching a nearby city, while trying to avoid being a meal for the beast themselves.

name: Becoming Ms Bennet: Pride & Prejudice Cut
actors: Lexi Giovagnoli, David Witts, James Nitti, Arianna America, Hamish Briggs
description: Kate, an American internet star, lands her dream role as Elizabeth Bennet in a production of Pride and Prejudice. But she struggles with her accent and her theatrically trained co-star, Liam, who feels she is not worthy to play the iconic role.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
actors: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Achyuth Kumar, Malavika Avinash, Anant Nag, Ramya Krishnan
description: A period drama set in the 1970s, KGF follows the story of a fierce rebel who rises against the brutal oppression in Kolar Gold Fields and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

name: Mystery Road
actors: Aaron Pedersen, Hugo Weaving, Jack Thompson, Ryan Kwanten, Tony Barry, Bruce Spence, Damian Walshe-Howling, Tasma Walton
description: A murdered girl is found under a bridge on a remote road and indigenous detective Jay Swan gets the case. Jay finds that no-one is that interested in solving the murder of an indigenous teenager and he is forced to work alone.

name: The Fisher King
actors: Jeff Bridges, Robin Williams, Mercedes Ruehl, Amanda Plummer, Michael Jeter, Lara Harris, Kathy Najimy, Ted Ross
description: Two troubled men face their terrible destinies and events of their past as they join together on a mission to find the Holy Grail and thus to save themselves.

name: Contracted: Phase II
actors: Matt Mercer, Marianna Palka, Morgan Peter Brown, Anna Lore, Laurel Vail, Najarra Townsend, Caroline Williams
description: Picking up directly where the previous film left off, the story follows Riley, one of the last people to come in contact with Samantha, as he scrambles to track down those responsible for the outbreak before the highly contagious disease not only consumes his body, but the world as we know it.

name: Life Below Zero: First Alaskans
description: Follows Alaskan Natives who are focusing on their right to preserve their threatened ways of life, to ensure its survival for the next thousand years.

name: Falling Sons
description: Days after their father's death, the Somerset brothers must face the one thing they despise - each other.

name: Basement
actors: Danny Dyer, Jimi Mistry, Emily Beecham, Soraya Radford, Kierston Wareing, Lois Winstone, Christopher Ellison, Carolyn Jordan
description: Six friends are lured to an underground basement for a sinister experiment, will they escape, but most importantly will they live or die?

name: Dead Again
actors: Kenneth Branagh, Derek Jacobi, Andy García, Robin Williams, Lois Hall, Emma Thompson, Wayne Knight, Hanna Schygulla
description: In 1949 composer Roman Strauss is executed for the vicious murder of his wife Margaret with a pair of scissors. In 1990s Los Angeles a mute amnesiac woman shows up at an orphanage and private eye Mike Church is called in to investigate. Under hypnosis both the woman and Church seem to have a strange link back to the Strauss murder.

name: Irreversible
actors: Monica Bellucci, Vincent Cassel, Albert Dupontel, Jo Prestia, Philippe Nahon, Stéphane Drouot, Jean-Louis Costes, Mick Gondouin
description: A woman’s lover and her ex-boyfriend take justice into their own hands after she becomes the victim of a rapist. Because some acts can’t be undone. Because man is an animal. Because the desire for vengeance is a natural impulse. Because most crimes remain unpunished.

name: I Heard You Buy Souls
actors: Gerone Hennessee, Macy Jacob, Devlin Laidlaw, Marley Lammers, Jennifer Lavin, Daniel Christopher McCurry, Allyson L. Smith, Kathleen Valent
description: A man and a demon search for purpose as they journey through hell and heaven.

name: Ban The Sadist Videos
actors: Wes Craven, Ruggero Deodato, Jesús Franco, Dario Argento, Romano Scavolini, Stephen Woolley, Julian Petley, Mary Whitehouse
description: An in-depth analysis of the "Video Nasty" scandal of the early 1980s in Britain.

name: The End Is Nye
actors: Bill Nye
description: Explore the myths and realities of both natural and unnatural threats, from viruses to volcanoes, asteroids to authoritarianism, and climate change to chemical warfare.

name: Slashers
actors: Sarah Joslyn Crowder, Tony Curtis Blondell, Kieran Keller, Jerry Sprio, Carolina Pla, Sofia de Medeiros, Claudine Shiraishi, Christopher Piggins
description: Japan's number one extreme reality show is having it's first all-American special! Six lucky contestants, chosen from thousands of applicants, will have the chance to win millions of dollars, and all they have to do is stay alive!

name: The Wizard of Lies
actors: Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer, Hank Azaria, Kristen Connolly, Lily Rabe, Alessandro Nivola, Kathrine Narducci, Nathan Darrow
description: A look behind the scenes at Bernie Madoff's massive Ponzi scheme, how it was perpetrated on the public and the trail of destruction it left in its wake, both for the victims and Madoff's family.

name: Waking Up To Danger
actors: Donna Benedicto, Erin Boyes, Hamza Fouad, Keith Arbuthnot
description: A young mother attempts to pick up the pieces after a horrible accident damages her memory, but she soon begins to suspect that her husband’s indiscretions are what caused her suffering and her whole family might still be in danger

name: War Raiders
actors: Steve Diasparra, Natalie Hallead
description: Eastern Europe, 1944. The Allies successfully bomb a dam in France, wiping out a German installation, concealing secret codes valuable for Allied decoding. A rogue band of soldiers is sent to retrieve the codes from a hidden vault in the flooded towns ruins and bring them back to the Allied headquarters. Along the way they must fight off pockets of Nazi resistance and stay alive.

name: National Theatre Live: Vanya
actors: Andrew Scott
description: Andrew Scott brings multiple characters to life in Chekhov's Uncle Vanya, filmed live in West End, London. Hopes, dreams, and regrets are thrust into sharp focus in this one-man adaptation which explores the complexities of human emotions.

name: Hilo 2
actors: Wilfred La Salle, Christopher LaVine, Shawn Black, Stan Shields, Jamaal Burcher, Tesfa King, Kyle Bland, Genii
description: Having been lured into becoming a corrupt cop on the wrong side of the law , Detective "Wilfred La Salle" embarks on his journey to right the wrongs he has committed while also facing off against his former friend and partner now turned criminal mastermind "Gorgeous George" and his criminal Syndicate made up of some of the most dangerous men in the city simply known as - "The Clown Gang"

name: Paruthiveeran (Hindi)
actors: Karthi, Priyamani, Ponvannan, Kanja Karuppu, Saravanan, Sujatha Sivakumar, Sampath Raj, Samuthirakani
description: A village tough finally succumbs to the unconditional love of his angelic cousin, but his romance faces insurmountable challenges, including family opposition and his own delinquent personality.

name: The Blazing World
actors: Carlson Young, Udo Kier, Dermot Mulroney, Vinessa Shaw, John Karna, SoKo, Bailey Lewis
description: Ever since Margaret was six years old, she has been haunted by the memory of watching her sister drown during an explosive fight between her parents. As a young woman, she slides further into her twisted inner life, ultimately finding herself on the brink of suicide. Through an epic journey down the smokiest and scariest corridors of her imagination, she tries to exorcise the demons pushing her closer and closer to the edge.

name: In Pursuit Of Silence
description: A meditative exploration of silence and the impact of noise on our lives. The film takes us on an immersive cinematic journey around the globe—from a traditional tea ceremony in Kyoto, to the streets of Mumbai, the loudest city on the planet—and inspires us to both experience silence and celebrate the wonders of our world.

name: Ghosts Of Morgan City
description: There’s something strange happening in Morgan City, Louisiana and Travel Channel’s latest paranormal team is ready to get to the bottom of it.

name: G Loc
actors: Stephen Moyer, Tala Gouveia, Casper Van Dien, John Rhys-Davies, Emily Haigh, Toby Osmond, Shayne Ward, Alana Wallace
description: With Earth virtually destroyed, Bran Marshall flees to Rhea, a nearby planet now hostile towards "Earthers". Escaping onto a Rhean supply ship, he finds the crew slaughtered, with the only survivor a female warrior named Ohsha. As the two try to kill one another, the ship is damaged by meteorites. Bran and Ohsha must join forces to salvage the craft before it impacts the planet below — and the humans that live there.

name: Kaali Khuhi
actors: Shabana Azmi, Riva Arora, Satyadeep Misra, Sanjeeda Sheikh, Leela Samson
description: When a restless spirit curses a Punjab village that has a history of female infanticide, the town's fate lies in the hands of a 10-year old girl, Shivangi.

name: American Godfathers: The Five Families
actors: Michael Imperioli
description: Explore five powerful New York Mafia families, who ran organized crime in America.

name: Trophy Wife
actors: Erica Peeples, Sean Patrick Thomas, Tiffany Black
description: Follows Toni, who has a complete breakdown and ends up in a mental facility after the unexpected news that his husband was murdered, and even her was a suspect. She must now fight to clear her name and figure out who betrayed her husband.

name: Agenda 2: Masters Of Deceit
description: Filmmaker Curtis Bowers hit the road in 2010 with his film AGENDA, people began to wake up. AGENDA became one of the best selling independent documentaries of all time, and grass roots America finally had a tool to connect the dots.

name: Halloween Candy
description: Spending her first Halloween alone, a recently divorced writer searches for inspiration from trick-or-treaters who come to her door. The night becomes a nightmare when one surprise visitor makes this Halloween one she will never forget.

name: Panchayat
actors: Sanvika, Kusum Shastri, Ashok Pathak
description: Panchayat is a comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh. Stuck between crazy villagers and a difficult village lifestyle Abhishek starts his job with the sole motivation of getting out of there as soon as possible, for which he even prepares for CAT.

name: Spiders on a Plane
actors: Danielle Scott, Lauren Budd, Lila Lasso, Jamie Langlands, Connor Powles, Wayne Dobson, Phillip Hockley, Andrew Rolfe
description: A group of young travellers discover their dream vacation has turned into a nightmare when an infestation of top-secret deadly spiders escapes mid-flight. When the pilots are killed by the aggressive arachnids, the group must fend for themselves against the relentless swarm and their monstrous "mother" spider, measuring a massive 5 feet.

name: Dead Whisper
actors: Samuel Dunning, Codey Gillum, Samantha Hill, Chris Goodwin, Bruce Winant, Dhane Ross, Rob Evan
description: Elliot Campbell, a Cape Cod lawyer, is drawn to a mysterious island where he is tempted by a reunion with his dead daughter, but at the peril of his soul.

name: Trafficked With Mariana Van Zeller
actors: Mariana van Zeller
description: TRAFFICKED explores the complex and often dangerous inner workings of the global underworld - smuggling networks, and black and informal markets.

name: Rajdhani Express
actors: Leander Paes, Jimmy Shergill, Priyanshu Chatterjee, Gulshan Rai, Sayali Bhagat, Mukesh Rishi, Puja Bose, Sudhanshu Pandey
description: An eclectic group of passengers travelling from Delhi to Mumbai aboard the Rajdhani Express has to deal with an unexpected situation.

name: Studio 54
actors: Ian Schrager, Steve Rubell, Donald Rubell, Michael Jackson, Farrah Fawcett, Liza Minnelli, Mikhail Baryshnikov, Jack Benny
description: Studio 54 was the epicenter of 70s hedonism - a place that not only redefined the nightclub, but also came to symbolize an entire era. Its co-owners, Ian Schrager and Steve Rubell, two friends from Brooklyn, seemed to come out of nowhere to suddenly preside over a new kind of New York society. Now, 39 years after the velvet rope was first slung across the club's hallowed threshold, a feature documentary tells the real story behind the greatest club of all time.

name: English Teacher
actors: Brian Jordan Alvarez, Stephanie Koenig, Sean Patton, Enrico Colantoni, Carmen Christopher, Jordan Firstman, Langston Kerman
description: A high school teacher in Austin tries to balance the competing demands of the students and their parents in a world where the rules seem to change every day.

name: Christmas In The Pines
actors: Jillian Murray, Dean Geyer, Leigh-Allyn Baker, Grant Goodeve, Victoria Staley, Aaron Mees, Jeff Rose, Stephen Ware
description: As Ariel, an up-and-coming magazine writer, and Mark, a successful architect, battle over ownership of an idyllic Christmas cottage, they soon discover that their cozy holiday getaway may not be the only thing they love.

name: Your Body Uncovered With Kate Garraway
actors: Kate Garraway, Guddi Singh, Karan Rajan
description: See your body like never before - from the inside out. Kate Garraway and Dr Guddi Singh use the latest technology to help patients understand their everyday medical conditions.

name: Strange Weather
actors: Holly Hunter, Carrie Coon, Kim Coates, Glenne Headly, Johnny McPhail, Ted Ferguson, Ransom Ashley, Susan Gallagher
description: Years after her son's suicide, a woman longs to confront both the past and a friend of his who took his business idea.

name: Run Ronnie Run
actors: David Cross, Bob Odenkirk, Bruce Taylor, Leon Lamar, India Cosper, Blaze Walker, Storm Walker, Jill Talley
description: A redneck with an uncanny knack for getting arrested becomes the star of his own reality program.

name: No Woman No Try
actors: Ugo Monye, Sue Anstiss, Victoria H. Rush, Stefania Evans, Shaunagh Brown, Zaniab Alema
description: A look at the current status of gender, ethnicity and sexual equality within women's rugby.

name: Disfluency
actors: Molly Hagan, Libe Barer, Ariela Barer, Chelsea Alden, Dylan Arnold, Travis Tope, Kimiko Singer, Wayne David Parker
description: When Jane fails her final college class, she returns home to her parent's lake house where she comes to terms with the confusing trauma that derailed her senior year.

name: Mithra Mandali (Hindi)
actors: Priyadarshi Pullikonda, Niharika NM, Vishnu Oi, Rag Mayur, Prasad Behara
description: The lives of a group of misfit friends become chaotic after one of them falls for a politician's daughter.

name: Its My Life
actors: Harman Baweja, Genelia D'Souza, Nana Patekar, Kapil Sharma, Amar Upadhyay, Juhi Babbar
description: A remake of Bommarillu (2006), the film primarily revolves around the relationship between a father and son, in which the father's excessive concern for his son, and interference in his life, leads to the latter harbouring bitterness towards his overbearing father.

name: Ek Mini Katha (Hindi)
actors: Santosh Shoban, Kavya Thapar, Shraddha Das, Brahmaji, Nellore Sudharshan, Saptagiri, Posani Krishna Murali, Keshav Deepak
description: Santosh suffers from a psychological problem that causes him to be insecure about his size. Struggling to find a solution, he erases the idea of marriage altogether until he meets Amrutha, with whom he falls in love.

name: Uganda Be Kidding Me Live
actors: Chelsea Handler
description: A culmination of Chelsea Handler's stand-up comedy tour in support of her fourth New York Times #1 Bestseller, Uganda Be Kidding Me.

name: Hollywood Houselift With Jeff Lewis
actors: Jeff Lewis
description: Jeff Lewis, balancing high-maintenance celebrities and ambitious home design projects while juggling his staff and personal life, which are all a work in progress.

name: Halloween 5: The Revenge Of Michael Myers
actors: Donald Pleasence, Danielle Harris, Ellie Cornell, Wendy Foxworth, Beau Starr, Don Shanks, Jeffrey Landman, Tamara Glynn
description: Presumed dead after a shoot-out with the Haddonfield police, Michael Myers is secretly nursed back to health -- and returns a year later to kill again and once more targets his young niece, Jamie. Jamie is now recovering in the local children's hospital after attacking her stepmother and losing her voice. Her mental link with her evil uncle may be the key to uprooting her family tree.

name: 10 Days of a Curious Man
actors: Nejat ??ler, Ilayda Akdo?an, ?enay Gürler, Ece ?rtem, Hazal Suba??, R?za Kocao?lu, Ayten Uncuo?lu, Cem Uslu
description: When a young woman goes missing in Istanbul, a jaded writer gets tangled up in a deadly chain of events as he sets out to find her—and a good story.

name: Hello Jack The Kindness Show
actors: Jack McBrayer
description: Preschoolers are invited into a world where a little act of kindness can change the world. Alongside special guest stars, Jack inspires kids to solve problems with kindness and heart while showcasing stories where acts of kindness are shown through “The Three C’s” – caring, connecting and cascading – from one person to another.

name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
